Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 21st overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1966...
Injured on 6/13/1968 with a Stiff Neck, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1970, off Don Loun (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/14/1970, off Eddie Watt (NYY)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Detroit on 10/2/1970...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Detroit on 7/7/1975...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Boston on 4/9/1976...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Injured on 5/29/1977 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Oakland on 4/4/1978...
Injured on 5/21/1978 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Cleveland on 7/23/1978...
Drove in 7 runs against Cleveland on 9/29/1978...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1978, hitting .345 with 6 HR, 26 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/7/1980 to a 4-year deal worth $4,500,000 per year...
Injured on 4/16/1980 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/27/1980 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against California on 7/24/1981...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 1982...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago (A) on 4/2/1983...
Had 2000th career hit on 4/24/1983, off Dave Downs (NYY)...
Injured on 5/9/1983 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had 21-game hitting streak snapped on 6/17/1983...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
